m_szDocTitle: NEL ASA: Fourth Quarter 2015 Results | Business Wire
m_szDocSumamry: NEL ASA: Fourth Quarter 2015 Results February 17, 2016 01:09 AM Eastern Standard Time OSLO, Norway--( BUSINESS WIRE )--Regulatory News: NEL ASA (“NEL”) reported a negative EBITDA of NOK 4.2 million in the        fourth quarter of 2015 on revenues of NOK 30.3 million. During the        fourth quarter of 2015, NEL announced landmark contracts and        strengthened the balance sheet to take an active role in the future        growth and development of the hydrogen market. In the fourth quarter, NEL entered into a letter of intent with Uno-X        Gruppen AS (Uno-X), part of Reitangruppen AS, f
